snippet.title: SCP - The Mystery Man (ARG)
snippet.description:
Dive into the enigmatic world of "The Mystery Man," an [b]Alternate Reality Game (ARG) that blurs the lines between reality and fiction. In this immersive experience, you become the investigator, unraveling the secrets of the SCP Universe through a series of intricate puzzles and cryptic clues.

Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2451680/SCP__Mystery_Man/
Window & MacOS - https://hybriona.itch.io/mystery-man
Web - https://play.hybriona.com/mysteryman/
Android - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.hybriona.mysteryman
iOS - https://apps.apple.com/us/app/scp-the-mystery-man-arg/id6504680598
